name: Cardboard Shmup
description:
In this Shoot 'em Up game your goal is to survive as long as possible and shoot enemies in order to achieve a new highscore. Select your favorite ship, and blast your way through evil paper space ships! Pickup health packs or ice projectiles to get an advantage over your enemies.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD
  • Shoot with the Left Mouse Button (holding down also works!)
  • Shoot ice projectiles with the Right Mouse Button (you need to pick up ice in the game in order to use ice projectiles)
  • Controllers are supported as well while playing (not in menus unfortunately)
    • Shoot with A
    • Shoot Ice projectiles with B
    • Move with the left Joystick
